title: Crossing the Eastern Front: The True Story of a Teenage SS Volunteer
description: Kidnapped at gunpoint by a German unit from his village in the heart of Transylvania, a devout teenager finds himself starving to death in a POW camp. The only way out is by joining a Romanian Waffen-SS unit. As the Anglo-American and Soviet fronts grip Nazi Germany in an ever-tightening vise, the last months of war find him on the losing side, wearing its most hated uniform.
author: Alan Stroe
